import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-preview", templateUrl: "./preview.component.html", styleUrls: ["./preview.component.scss"], }) export class PreviewComponent implements OnInit { constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} openWikiPage(): void { window.open("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ukraine"); } }
